name: DO WHAT WE LIKE
content: 被堵塞的耳朵 听见了
虽然陌生却又熟悉的感觉
相信着 我试着睁开眼睛
Cause I know how this feels
就算是那深渊也一起徘徊
Say you won't let me go
And we do what we like
Yeah yeah we do what we like
Say you won't let me go
And we do what we like
Do what we do what we like
Do what we do what we like
Do what we do what we like
Do what we do what we like
看到了太多事物的存在
曾经无从得知 也无法想象
连呼吸的方法都不知道
我逐渐敞开心扉 找寻真正的自己
就算是那深渊也一起徘徊

Yeah yeah we do what we like
